p.d: David, a music teacher, is brutally attacked by an unknown who tries to break his hands. He is saved by Daniel, a hitman hired to kill the husband of Julia, his mistress. The latter warns him about the young woman's strange behaviour. In vain... Directed by: Michel Deville (France, 1985) Based on the novel "Sur la terre comme au ciel" by René Belletto. Cast: Christophe Malavoy (David Aurphet), Nicole Garcia (Julia Tombsthay), Michel Piccoli (Graham Tombsthay), Anémone (Edwige Ledieu), Richard Bohringer (Daniel Forest) Genre: detective Awards: 2 César awards in 1986 (Best Director, Best Editing) Parental guidance: TV-PG
